body:
What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Play Amulet of Vigor
2. Play Wood Elves, choose Stomping Ground
3. Stomping Ground enters battlefield untapped, you're not promted to pay 2 life, Amulet of Vigor does not trigger What is the expected output? What do you see instead? Wood Elves read: ...and put that card into play.
Stomping Ground reads: ... you may pay 2 life. If you don't, Stomping Ground enters battlefield tapped.

It should be, like, play Wood Elves, choose Stomping Ground, being prompted to pay 2 life and either way it should be untapped by paying 2 life or by having Amulet of Vigor already in play. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? If you are reporting a game play bug, please attach your game.log file. If you are reporting a crash, please attach both crash.log and game.log files (both files are found in the main game folder). Please provide any additional information below.
author: [Landhotel.Westerwald](https://code.google.com/u/Landhotel.Westerwald/)
